BBEX3.M.KZT.EUR.CA.AC.A01: Exchange rates for the euro in Kazakhstan / EUR 1 = KZT ... (middle)
Source: National Bank of Kazakhstan, Almaty.

Comment on 2009-02: On 5 February 2009, the tenge was devalued. We recorded the following exchange rates:  4 February 2009 EUR 1 = KZT 157.07  5 February 2009 EUR 1 = KZT 186.55. Calculated devaluation: 15.8%.

Comment on 2014-02: On 11 February 2014, the prevailing exchange rate band was changed from 145 - 155 tenge to 182 - 188 tenge per US dollar. We recorded the following exchange rates: 11 February 2014 EUR 1 = KZT 212.25 12 February 2014 EUR 1 = KZT 224.07 13 February 2014 EUR 1 = KZT 251.57. Calculated using the exchange rates from 11 and 13 February 2014, the tenge was devalued by 15.6%.
